message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I'm looking to keep my spending within a budget of $120. Would you be able to adjust the price accordingly?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $130. What do you think?
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate the flexibility. However, I'm still aiming to stay within my budget. Could we perhaps negotiate down to $125?

I'm getting closer to meeting your budget, Bob, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $135. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement!
